newsitem.title: USA: Unison expects Q3 shr $0.08 to $0.10. [CORRECTED 22:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Unison expects Q3 shr $0.08 to $0.10. [CORRECTED 22:50 GMT]

text.p: Unison Software Inc said Wednesday it expects third quarter net earnings to be in the range of $0.08 to $0.10 per share, which is below year ago results of $0.13 a share and below analysts' estimates.

The company said in a statement it expects revenues for the third quarter ended February 28, to be in the range of $9.3 million to $9.6 million also below estimates, but up from the year ago figure of $8.2 million.
Analysts had estimated Unison would earn $0.16 (corrects from $0.13) a share for the third quarter, according to First Call.
